charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking along
the coast when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] realized [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] could hear a
loud voice mixed in with the sound of the waves.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_0200_1:
What’s wrong, Makuhita? You’re never gonna
catch me at that rate!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_0300_1:
You’re gonna have to show me more if you
wanna catch me! Let me see your guts!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1101_0400_2:
Brawly and Makuhita had come up on land 
and were glaring at each other.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_0500_1: Heh, looks like I’ve finally lit a fire under you.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_0600_1: That’s it! I know you’ve got more guts than that!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0401_0800_1:
Huh? [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
I didn’t expect to see you here.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0402_1000_1:
Huh? [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
I didn’t expect to see you here.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_1100_1: Did you think we were fighting?
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_1200_1:
If you did, you’re wrong. We were training to
improve our balance for surfing.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_1300_1:
Makuhita wanted me to help improve his
surfing skills.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_1400_1: I was just trying to get him fired up.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0401_1600_1:
Surfing is more than just our hobby.
It’s serious training for us.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0402_1800_1:
Surfing is more than just our hobby.
It’s serious training for us.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_1900_1:
It’s been that way ever since I taught Makuhita
how to surf.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_2000_1: At first, he couldn’t even stand up on the board.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_2100_1:
But every time he failed, Makuhita’s toughness
wouldn’t let him quit. He never gave up, so he
improved quickly.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_2200_1:
That unwavering fighting spirit that never gives
up—no matter what—is what made Makuhita.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_2300_1: No, not just Makuhita. It made us both grow.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0401_2500_1:
Of course! Seeing Makuhita’s fighting spirit lit
a fire in my heart, too!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0302_2600_1: You guys have worked hard, huh?
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0402_2700_1:
Yup! No matter how hard things got, we never
threw in the towel.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0402_2800_1:
When Makuhita is working as hard as he does,
it gives me strength, too.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_2900_1:
Makuhita’s strength is that no matter how hard
you hit him, he always gets back up.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_3100_1: Huh?! Makuhita?! What are you doing?!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1101_3200_2:
Makuhita turned toward Brawly and
charged right at him!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_3300_1: Hahaha! I guess he was still mad from earlier.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_3400_1:
Even still, you’ve gotten stronger,
haven’t you, Makuhita?
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_3500_1:
You’re like a totally different Pokémon from
when we first met!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_3600_1:
We have to keep our momentum if we wanna
get stronger than [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0401_3800_1:
I think you’re the opponent everyone should
be afraid of.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0402_4000_1:
I think you’re the opponent everyone should
be afraid of.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_4100_1:
You have a fighting spirit just like Makuhita’s.
You never break, no matter what happens.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_4200_1:
You’re a tough opponent that we won’t be able
to defeat easily, but that makes me excited.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_4400_1:
The bigger the wave that’s coming at you,
the more a surfer wants to ride it!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_1201_0100_1:
Ah, Brawly! To think that we would see each
other again on Pasio of all places. Shall we pick
up our training where we left off?
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_1201_0200_1:
Totes, Bruno! But you’d better not think we’re the
same as we were when you saw us last time!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_1201_0300_1:
Ah, I can see the drive for victory burning in
your eyes!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_1201_0400_1:
All right, let’s get this started, bro!
I’m gonna take you down!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_0101_0100_1: You’d better be ready for this big wave, Bruno!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_0101_0200_1:
A wave is nothing but another wall to
break through!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_0501_0100_1: Even our overwhelming power was bested...
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_0501_0200_1:
That was a rad battle, bro! It’s great that we
were able to go all-out against each other!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_0501_0300_1:
I must train more... Brawly, will you lend me
your strength?
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_0501_0400_1: Aw yeah! We’ll train all over Pasio!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_0501_0600_1:
Bodacious, my dude! Now training’ll be even
more awesome!
